body_html:
@apaszke I have indeed pondered about this and the promise of encapsulation really might not scale here. I think I’ll change it.

Although in this case, you could look up that long hierarchical name via that string, since parameters()’s keys are hierarchical like that

body:
@apaszke I have indeed pondered about this and the promise of encapsulation really might not scale here. I think I’ll change it.

Although in this case, you could look up that long hierarchical name via that string, since parameters()’s keys are hierarchical like that
